entry.title: 3M Scotch-Weld 3549-2OZ-KIT - Urethane Adhesive 3549 Part B/A in Brown - 2 fl. Oz (60 ml) 7000046484
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Urethane Adhesives
Price: 43.96

[shortdesc]

3M Scotch-Weld Urethane Adhesive, 3549, part B/A, brown, 2 fl. oz. (60 ml)

  • 3M Scotch-Weld Urethane Adhesive 3549 B/A is a two-component, polyurethane adhesive which cures at room temperature or with heat to form tough, impact-resistant structural bonds
  • It provides excellent adhesion to many primed or painted metal and plastic substrates and are designed to develop sag resistance approximately 30 seconds after mixing.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch-Weld
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Urethane Adhesives
    Volume 2 fl. Oz, 60 ml

    Product Information

  • Two-part urethane delivers extremely tough, flexible bonds
  • Designed for vertical and other applications that require no slumping or sagging of the adhesive bead
  • Flexible adhesive that is capable of bonding dissimilar substrates

    • Suggested Application

  • For primed or painted metal and plastic
  • May be applied with spatula, trowel, or flow equipment

Type: Urethane Adhesives
Price: 105.52

[shortdesc]

3M Scotch-Weld Composite Urethane Adhesive, DP6330NS, green, 400 mL duo-pak

  • 3M Scotch-Weld Composite Urethane Adhesive DP6330NS is a high-performance adhesive with a long open time for bonding composites and multiple materials, such as metals to composites
  • It has excellent impact resistance, and a low viscosity that is non-sagging for easier dispensing, yet stays where it is placed
  • It also offers low temperature flexibility and low shrinkage.

  • Non-sag formulation resists running and slumping of adhesive

3M Semi-Rigid Plastic Repair, 04240, 6.8 fl. oz. (200 ml)

  • 3M™ Semi-Rigid Plastic Parts Repair, 04240, is a two-part urethane adhesive designed for bonding or back side reinforcing of many plastic parts
  • This formula provides a quick set up time and good internal strength needed for reinforcing and bonding of plastic parts
  • For best results use in conjunction with 3M™ Polyolefin Adhesion Promoter, 05907, when repairing low surface energy plastics such as TPO, PP and ABS.
